title: conferred on me by section 75(2) of the Finance Act 2024 (No. 43 of 2024),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2024 (Section 75(1))
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2024 (Section 75(1)) 

(Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance act 2024 (section 75(1)) (commencement) order 2025

title: conferred on me by section 75(2) of the Finance Act 2024 (No. 43 of 2024),
heading: 2. The 1st day of June 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 75(1)
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of June 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 75(1) 

of the Finance Act 2024 (No. 43 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 April, 2025. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 11th April, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [123] 3
